channel.title: VOID knight and rune crossbow help please
channel.description: Hello i got a little problem with void knight everythime if i wear void knight bottom it goes to the wrong place(to the weapon box) can someone please tell me how to fix those things? 1 more problem: If i use rune crossbow it doesnt hit with range its like using a weapon and everytime he hits the rune cbow dissapears and comes back again can someone please help me?

item.title: VOID knight and rune crossbow help please
item.dc:creator: @gr1ndlewald gr1ndlewald
item.description:
@gr1ndlewald wrote:

for the void knight thing just find the item codes and put them into the right places in your item4.java itll say tuff like public static int capes[] = { so under that you would put your items u want to be weilded as capes. same for all of the other equiptment slots

Read full topic
item.source: VOID knight and rune crossbow help please
